resources.string: This is the S.K.A.T.E Dice where you will be able to randomly roll tricks from your own list, or a pre-set list of tricks. To begin, start by choosing one of the options below!
I want to make my own list of tricks
I want to use a pre-set list of tricks
This is the preset S.K.A.T.E dice with different levels of difficulty. Choosing one of the following optiosn will allow you to play with an unseen list of tricks.
To add a trick, type it in and submit it using the "Add Trick" button. Add at least five tricks and press "Play" to use the S.K.A.T.E Dice!

When you are ready to begin playing, press "Start" to roll a random trick from the list. Give the trick an attempt, and Press the Tick if you land the trick, or the Cross if you fail to land the trick. Remember, last letter gets two tries!
